issues.description: Hero lacks 8-second comprehension test — 'operating system' metaphor unclear without visual anchor
issues.rationale: Visitors won't grasp 'hand it off without losing control' abstract promise without concrete visual proof

issues.description: No sticky CTA creates 800px+ dead zones between conversion points on mobile scroll
issues.rationale: Mobile users lose momentum during long content sections without persistent action availability

issues.description: Trust proof buried below fold — no immediate credibility indicators in hero viewport
issues.rationale: Small business owners need instant validation before engaging with 'operating system' concept

issues.description: Pricing comprehension requires horizontal scroll on mobile if showing feature comparison
issues.rationale: Complex pricing tables force cognitive load when users can't see full tier comparison

issues.description: Mobile hero stacking buries primary CTA below 600px fold on common devices
issues.rationale: Primary action invisible without scroll defeats instant conversion opportunity

issues.description: Section order places 'how it works' before problem validation — assumes awareness
issues.rationale: Users need problem resonance before solution mechanics to maintain scroll momentum

issues.description: Typography hierarchy unclear — h2 sections blend with body at default size ratios
issues.rationale: Scanning users miss section boundaries without 1.5x+ size differentiation

issues.description: Card components lack visual grouping — equal spacing creates parsing ambiguity
issues.rationale: Feature benefits blur together without clear containment or 24px+ gap rhythm

issues.description: Proof bar placement at footer misses prime trust-building opportunity above fold
issues.rationale: Logo parade or testimonial strip needs hero proximity for instant credibility

issues.description: Conditional: If tap targets under 48px, mobile conversion drops from fat-finger frustration
issues.rationale: Small business owners often use phones one-handed while multitasking

suggestedFixes.fix: Add visual dashboard preview or 'control panel' mockup showing real-time business metrics within hero section
suggestedFixes.rationale: Concrete visual makes 'operating system' metaphor instantly graspable in 3 seconds

suggestedFixes.fix: Implement sticky bottom bar on mobile with 'Start Free Trial' button appearing after 200px scroll
suggestedFixes.rationale: Persistent CTA maintains conversion momentum throughout long-form content journey

suggestedFixes.fix: Insert mini audit-log preview or '247 businesses monitored' counter directly in hero viewport
suggestedFixes.rationale: Immediate social proof validates platform legitimacy before scroll commitment

suggestedFixes.fix: Use vertical card stack on mobile with expandable feature rows instead of horizontal table
suggestedFixes.rationale: Eliminates horizontal scroll; each tier becomes scannable in single viewport

suggestedFixes.fix: Restructure to headline + CTA button within first 500px, push hero image below or use background
suggestedFixes.rationale: Guarantees primary action visibility on all devices without scroll requirement

suggestedFixes.fix: Reorder to: Hero → Problem/Pain → Solution Promise → How It Works → Pricing → FAQ
suggestedFixes.rationale: Problem-first narrative builds emotional buy-in before mechanical explanation

suggestedFixes.fix: Set h2 to 32px desktop / 24px mobile with 600 weight; body stays 16px/400 for 2x contrast
suggestedFixes.rationale: Clear size hierarchy enables 10-second page scanning without reading

suggestedFixes.fix: Apply 80px between major sections, 40px between subsections, 24px within card groups
suggestedFixes.rationale: Rhythmic spacing creates clear content chunks for cognitive processing

suggestedFixes.fix: Position logo bar or '500+ businesses' counter immediately below hero CTA at 120px from top
suggestedFixes.rationale: Trust indicators in initial viewport reduce bounce before scroll engagement

suggestedFixes.fix: Enforce 48px minimum touch target for all CTAs and interactive elements on mobile
suggestedFixes.rationale: Reduces mis-taps and frustration for one-handed mobile usage patterns

assumptions: Mobile tap targets not yet defined at 48px minimum
Pricing table uses horizontal scroll on mobile
Hero image takes significant vertical space on mobile
